data.title: Apple Cider Vinegar
data.description: Cymbiotika's Apple Cider Vinegar capsules are made with organic apples in a two-step fermentation process, where fructose from apples is converted to alcohol, and then probiotic bacteria transforms the alcohol into acetic acid. This bacteria strain is known as the mother and contains dozens of probiotics essential for health. In our apple cider vinegar supplements, we've added Chromax Chromium Picolinate and Thiamine, two compounds proven to enhance metabolism and improve insulin resistance. Consuming ACV in pill form rather than liquid form simplifies daily intake and eliminates the potent taste and odor of vinegar, while still providing you with all the benefits.
consumption_and_storage: Take 2 apple cider vinegar pills capsules daily
Store: Keep in a cool dark place
data.disclaimers: To be used as directed by your healthcare provider or physician.

data.title: Coated Silver
benefits: Neutralizes viruses, fungus, yeast, and mold
Supports healthy bacteria for a robust gut microbiome
data.description: Cymbiotika's Coated Silver acts as a powerful shield for your immune system. Because our colloidal silver is coated, it is non-reactive and side-effect-free. It also has the highest PPM (parts per million) of any silver available, containing 240 ppm in one single drop.
consumption_and_storage: Add 1-5 drops to 8oz of water once a day for as long as needed
For compromised immune systems and times of illness: take 3-5 drops in a glass of water once a day for as long as needed
Pregnant or nursing mothers: our coated silver is non-reactive and much safer than uncoated colloidal and ionic silver Please consult with a licensed physician for proper protocols
Sinus rinse: Add 1 drop to a glass of warm water and flush the sinus using a Neti Pot or your preferred nasal irrigation device
Cough or lung infections: Add 2-5 drops to distilled water in an air humidifier and diffuse while sleeping
Sore throat: Add 1 drop to 8 oz of warm water with 1 tbsp of Celtic sea salt and gargle
Counter disinfectant: Add 3 drops to a spray bottle with water and use where needed Can be used as a disinfectant for cleaning air humidifiers, CPAP machines, or other medical equipment
Store in a cool dry place, away from direct sunlight Do not freeze Avoid oral contact with the dropper to preserve freshness

data.description: Healthy Glow takes a multifunctional approach to slow down the rate at which we age. It's designed with restorative peptides, growth factors, and ceramides to rejuvenate cells and promote beauty at the cellular level. Healthy Glow encourages cellular repair and hydration, supports skin elasticity and collagen production, and diminishes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, giving the skin a youthful complexion and radiant glow. Our formula contains three potent compounds that combat premature aging: Spermidine, and Hyaluronic Acid. Spermidine mimics fasting and caloric restriction to induce autophagy, which limits inflammation and oxidative stress, the main culprits of aging and related diseases. Hyaluronic Acid promotes softer, healthier skin, which helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

data.title: Liposomal Vitamin C
data.description: Vitamin C is a powerful antioxidant that plays a key role in immune system function, collagen production, and healthy aging. Our Liposomal Vitamin C supplement is derived from a blend of Non-GMO L-Ascorbic Acid and Sodium Ascorbate. To create the perfect synergy, we added Biotin (Vitamin B7), one of nature's most beautifying vitamins that supports the production of proteins and enzymes that are needed for healthy skin, nails and hair growth.Unlike a traditional oral vitamin C dietary supplement, our liposomal technology provides superior absorption, enabling effective high level dosing. Liposomal delivery can significantly improve the bioavailability of vitamin C (the rate at which it's absorbed by the body). In fact, its efficiency is close to the intravenous delivery of vitamin C in medical settings. Its never been easier to reap all the benefits of immunity and beauty in one.

Magnesium is an essential mineral that is required for 80% of the body's metabolic functions. This magnesium supplement can help address one of the most common health conditions. In the United States, approximately 65% of all adults are magnesium deficient. Magnesium deficiency contributes to many chronic conditions including heart disease and loss of cognitive function. To support brain function and a healthy memory, we need to ensure we are receiving the necessary daily value of magnesium in our diets. Our magnesium supplement utilizes advanced liposomal delivery for fast and efficient absorption.

data.title: Molecular Hydrogen
benefits: Neutralizes harmful effects of free radicals
data.description: The hydrogen molecule is the smallest molecule that exists, and serves as a powerful antioxidant within the body. Due to its minuscule size, it crosses cellular barriers and absorbs easily throughout the body. The human body requires the right balance of free radicals to promote antioxidant activity. Hydrogen immediately provides balance in the body by neutralizing free radicals and oxidative stress. By achieving this at the cellular level, the body maintains homeostasis and slows premature aging. This is done by adding hydrogen gas to water, increasing its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. Our H2 tablets are the best solution for creating hydrogen rich water.Produces 12ppm of Molecular Hydrogen per serving
consumption_and_storage: H2 molecular hydrogen tablets are fast-dissolving dietary supplements Dissolve one hydrogen tablet in 12-16 oz of room temperature water Drink immediately Best taken 30 minutes apart from food and on an empty stomach Do not swallow the hydrogen tablet directly
May repeat up to twice a day
Store: Keep in a cool, dark place away from direct sunlight
data.disclaimers: To be used as directed by your healthcare provider or physician.

data.title: NMN + Trans-Resveratrol
benefits: Neutralizes harmful effects of free radicals
Reduces oxidative stress and slows premature aging
data.description: NMN (Nicotinamide Mononucleotide) is a molecule derived from niacin, a form of Vitamin B3. Niacin is also referred to as nicotinic acid and is one of the 13 essential vitamins required by the human body for optimal health. NMN has gained recent attention for its potential for slowing down the aging process and its ability to improve mitochondrial function.Cymbiotika's NMN with added polyphenols and antioxidants can significantly boost NAD (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) levels throughout the body. NAD plays an important role in energy, metabolism and maintenance of healthy gene expression. By boosting NMN levels in the body through NMN supplementation, we enhance the biosynthesis of NAD and help restore declining levels of NAD as we age. Since NAD production is critical for keeping your cells working at optimal levels, Nicotinamide Mononucleotide is seen as an important dietary supplement for maintaining cellular health.
consumption_and_storage: Take 2 capsules dailyStore in a cool dark place
data.disclaimers: To be used as directed by your healthcare provider or physician.

data.title: Organic Matcha Powder
benefits: Naturally improves energy and fights fatigue
data.description: Cymbiotika's Organic Ceremonial Matcha is a fusion of the highest quality heirloom varietals that brings forth an invigorating effect and a smooth, delicious flavor. Our ceremonial grade matcha draws on multi-generational small family farms in Uji and Kagoshima, Japan. Kagoshima is known for producing Japan's finest organic matcha, where the rich volcanic soils of this southern region of Japan imbue a nuanced flavor not possible to achieve in other soils. Our organic ceremonial matcha is from the first harvest tea leaves, and only the top green tea leaves of each plant are processed in small batches by our national award-winning tea master. A few weeks before harvest, the tea fields are shaded to reduce the production of tannins, preserve the rich chlorophyll content, and increase the l-theanine and caffeine content. Our matcha green tea powder is 100% stone-ground and patiently and diligently crafted, providing you with superior quality and an exceptional experience.
consumption_and_storage: Add tsp (1g) of matcha powder into a cup or ceremonial tea bowl
Pour 1-2 ounces of hot water, mix with a bamboo whisk, and blend until smooth
Slowly add an additional 4-6 ounces of hot water, depending on the preferred strength
If using a blender or electric whisk, combine tsp (1g) of matcha powder to 6-8 ounces of water
Blend and enjoy!
data.disclaimers: To be used as directed by your healthcare provider or physician.

data.title: Plant Protein
data.description: Our scientifically backed blend of hemp, spirulina, and vanilla pea protein powder fuels your body with essential vitamins and minerals, whole-food nutrients and a full range of amino acids. It features 3 complete proteins, raw greens, fiber, pre and probiotics, digestive enzymes and adaptogenic mushrooms that aids muscle growth. Crafted with the highest quality organic ingredients, our vegan protein is made for sports nutrition and for all lifestyles.Trusted and used by the world's top athletes for lean muscle mass development.
consumption_and_storage: Mix 1 serving (1 scoop) in 810 ounces of cold water, your favorite milk, or a smoothie
Take any time of day or post workout
Store: Keep in a cool, dry place

data.title: Topical Magnesium Oil Spray
benefits: Promotes relaxation and decreases symptoms of anxiety
data.description: Cymbiotika's Topical Magnesium Oil spray is scientifically formulated to absorb into the bloodstream within minutes, keeping your skin free of oil residue. Magnesium is an essential trace mineral responsible for more than 300 enzymatic systems that regulate diverse biochemical reactions in the body, including muscle and nerve function, blood glucose control, blood pressure regulation, and healthy brain development. Prolonged magnesium deficiency can impact your long-term health and since our bodies cannot produce enough magnesium on its own, magnesium supplementation is the most effective way to elevate magnesium levels. Some signs of low magnesium levels include chronic health conditions such as muscle cramps or spasms.Topical, or transdermal magnesium is a quick and easy way to increase magnesium levels beyond taking an oral supplement. You can quickly address sore muscles and tired joints by applying this magnesium spray onto the problematic areas. Our topical magnesium oil spray also prepares your body for bed. Applying before bed can relax your body and mind for a good night's rest.
consumption_and_storage: 15-20 sprays twice a day
Spray and rub onto clean skin of the torso, chest, feet, legs, or arms Avoid sensitive areas Avoid contact with clothing, or other lotions until absorbed
Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight
data.disclaimers: To be used as directed by your healthcare provider or physician.

data.title: Ultimate Pain Balm
benefits: Stimulates blood flow and increases circulation
data.description: Infused with powerful plant compounds and stem cells that relieve pain, this medicinal balm penetrates deep below the skin to relax and warm muscles while reducing inflammation. The Ultimate Pain Balm is specially formulated to address sore muscles, joint pain, minor aches, and muscle pain, making it a versatile and reliable solution for managing pain associated with tension headaches, menstruation, rheumatoid arthritis, and gout. It combines the natural healing properties of essential oils and active ingredients such as menthol and camphor to provide fast and targeted relief for pain and discomfort.
consumption_and_storage: Apply balm liberally and gently massage the affected area
Do not use on damaged skin or mucous membranes This is intended for external use only Wash hands after application and avoid contact with eyes Repeat daily, as needed
Store in a cool, dry place
data.disclaimers: To be used as directed by your healthcare provider or physician.

data.title: ZINC Complex
benefits: Key nutrient for healthy immune system function
data.description: Cymbiotika's Zinc Complex dietary supplement combines three forms of zinc with clinically backed absorption technology. We also added Copper and Selenium, two essential elements that work synergistically to support multiple functions in the body. Zinc is responsible for many metabolic processes including reproductive function, sexual development, cognitive function and healthy immune system function. Other than maintaining a healthy metabolism, zinc complexes and zinc supplements can also improve skin health and energy levels.
consumption_and_storage: Take 1 capsule daily with food
Store: Keep in a cool dark place
ingredients: Zinc (as Zinc Bisglycinate and Zinc Monomethionine [OptiZinc])
ACTIValoe Aloe Vera (Aloe Barbandensis) Gel QM Powder 200x
